About

Hello there! My name is Sugandha Rao. I'm a front-end web developer based in London, UK. I am a driven individual with excitement and energy, always learning, and never bored. I am eager to keep up with the latest technologies, and I'm always up for a challenge.As I continue to gain experience in this ever expanding tech industry I hope to grow with experience and never stop learning new things.

While my focus is mobile-first responsive websites, HTML, CSS and JavaScript, my goal over the next several years is to expand my knowledge of the JavaScript and its libraries. On a daily basis you'll find me using HTML, CSS / BEM, JavaScript, NPM and Git. Currently, I am learning Angular, nodeJs and Gulp.

When I'm not behind a computer screen, I'm somewhere out there exploring, or at home painting with oils.
